title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Skills: Understanding Math Concepts for Students with Special Educational Needs: LT-IE

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 70% or more of numerical operation concepts according to their individualized LT-IEP (Learning Technology-Individualized Education Plan).
Learners can apply mathematical reasoning skills required for solving real-life problems at a complexity level of three or more through project-based tasks.

Learners implement ≥3 visual representations (graphs, tables, animations) of mathematical concepts in medical/nursing fields (dose calculation, drug concentration conversion) using smartphone-based tools (Desmos, GeoGebra) and achieve ≥80% accuracy through peer assessment and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
